Material used.Description: The kinase activity of recombinant LRRK2 protein was measured.

Readout description.Result Description: The variant NM_000177491.4:c.2565G>A showed a significant reduction in kinase activity, approximately 70% compared to wild-type LRRK2.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent kinase assays were performed.

Technical replicates.Description: Each assay was performed in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: A kinase-dead mutant of LRRK2 was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Kinase activity between 80% and 120% of baseline.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Kinase activity less than 80% or greater than 120% of baseline.
